BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Items.Title:
Membership Changes to Certain Standing Committees and Addition and Deletion of Subcommittees, Chairs and Allowances

The Committee on Rules Privileges and Elections respectfully, 

REPORTS

That it recommends favorable consideration by the Council of the following membership changes and allowances, to the following standing committees pursuant to Rules 7.00 and 7.20 of the Council and Section 26(b) of the Charter of the City of New York.

CIVIL SERVICE & LABOR
[Rodriquez]

CONSUMER AFFAIRS
[Fedler]
Addabbo

ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
[Rodriguez]

EDUCATION
Comrie
Yassky

FINANCE
[Rodriguez]

GENERAL WELFARE
[Addabbo]
[Rodriguez]
Quinn 
Sanders
Stewart
Gallagher

HIGHER EDUCATION
[Nelson]
Gennaro

PARKS & RECREATION
[FELDER]
Jackson
SANITATION & SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT
[Jackson]
Felder

STANDARDS & ETHICS
Miller

TRANSPORTATION
[Rodriguez]
Addabbo
Martinez

[SUBCOMMITTEE ON CRIME & SUBSTANCE ABUSE]
[Monserrate]

SUBCOMMITTEE ON IMMIGRATION
Stewart

[SUBCOMMITTEE ON REVENUE & FORECAST]
[Rodriguez]

____________________________________


Subcommittees
[Crime and Substance Abuse (Public Safety) - Monserrate - $4,000]
[Revenue and Forecast (Finance) - Rodriguez - $10,000]
Immigration (General Welfare) - Stewart - $4,000

Select Committees
Civil Rights - Monserrate - $4,000
Community Development - Vann $4,000
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Membership changes to certain standing committees
